summary:
A horse based on my character\'s DND fel steed.
Unique saddle.
Slightly quicker on the feet.

You can find him at the guardian stones.

My first release of a skyrim mod, though I\'ve been modding for self-satisfaction for years. If you find any bugs, and know how to troubleshoot them, please inform me and I\'ll fix them asap.
descriptionHtml:
Devil\'s Tail is based on my character\'s DND fel steed (yes, I\'ve created this version as well but do not want to intrude on the Blaze mod, pm me if you want it). The name came from the old animated movie Black Beauty, and I used the concept in my House Devir underdark campaign. Just a little backstory.

He comes with his own saddle, and is marked essential. I\'ve fine-tuned the speed to be a cut above the usual, without being too unrealistic. Feel free to pm me for specific texture requests, I enjoy working with you little crumb snatchers to help you get the exact look you want! (:


OH BROTHER WHERE ART THOU? You can find him at the guardian stones.


Manual installation

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder.
2) Make sure the DevilsTail.esp is checked in the launcher.

Requirements:
Skyrim 1.9.29.0.8 or higher



Known Issues:

None so far. This is brand SPANKING new. Please let me know if it causes any trouble and I\'ll hurry to fix it! (:

Uninstall: uncheck the .esp file in your mod manager.

Credits:

Thanks to mitchalek for the mane, tail and feathers (from blaze)
Thanks to mystikhybrid for the horse armors materials.
Thanks to Fierymarigold for the swift steeds body meshes. (In loving memory of Flicka.)
author: Tuggy
